section.para:
Planner Codes are used to identify Items that fall under the jurisdiction of
planners
codes for planners--that is, employees responsible for planning, scheduling, or procurement. To access the master list of Planner Codes, select the "Planner Codes" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Planner Codes" screen displays information on all existing Planner Codes, including Planner Code and Planner Code description.
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new Planner Code.

Enables you to edit highlighted Planner Codes. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Planner Code--except that when editing, the fields will contain Planner Code information. Double-clicking on a Planner Code will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Planner Code and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Planner Code and then select this button to remove it from the list.
